mapper.sql: id, waybill_code, create_site_code, print_pack_code, print_pack_time,print_invoice_code, print_invoice_time, create_time, update_time, yn, print_pack_user, print_invoice_user, pop_sup_id, pop_sup_name, quantity, cross_code, waybill_type, pop_receive_type, print_count, third_waybill_code, queue_no, package_barcode, operate_type, create_user_code, create_user, box_code, DRIVER_CODE, DRIVER_NAME, busi_id, busi_name

sql.where:
p.yn = 1
and p.waybill_code = #{waybillCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and p.create_site_code = #{createSiteCode, jdbcType=INTEGER}
and p.print_pack_time >= to_date(to_char(#{startTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and p.print_pack_time <= to_date(to_char(#{endTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and p.print_invoice_time >= to_date(to_char(#{startTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and p.print_invoice_time <= to_date(to_char(#{endTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and p.create_time >= NOW() - interval '7' DAY and p.waybill_code is not null and i.waybill_code is null

mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM pop_print WHERE waybill_code = #{waybillCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and yn = 1 AND LIMIT 1

SELECT
FROM pop_print WHERE waybill_code = #{waybillCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and yn = 1
SELECT count(p.id) from pop_print p left join inspection i on p.waybill_code = i.waybill_code and i.inspection_type = 40 and i.yn = 1

select.select:
SELECT p.id, p.waybill_code, p.create_site_code, p.print_pack_code, p.print_pack_time, p.print_invoice_code, p.print_invoice_time, p.print_pack_user, p.print_invoice_user, p.pop_sup_id, p.pop_sup_name, p.quantity, p.cross_code, p.waybill_type, p.pop_receive_type, p.third_waybill_code, p.queue_no, p.package_barcode, p.operate_type, p.create_user, p.create_user_code, p.box_code, p.DRIVER_CODE, p.DRIVER_NAME, p.busi_id, p.busi_name FROM pop_print p WHERE p.yn = 1 AND p.operate_type = 1 AND p.create_time <= NOW() - #{limitMin, jdbcType=VARCHAR}/(24 * 60) AND p.create_time >= NOW() - #{limitHour, jdbcType=VARCHAR}/24 AND p.create_time <= NOW() - #{LIMIT Min, jdbcType=VARCHAR}/(24 * 60) AND p.create_time >= NOW() - #{LIMIT Hour, jdbcType=VARCHAR}/24
AND p.pop_receive_type = 4 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM inspection i WHERE p.waybill_code = i.waybill_code AND p.package_barcode = i.package_barcode AND i.inspection_type = 60 AND i.yn = 1)
AND p.pop_receive_type < 4 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM inspection i WHERE p.waybill_code = i.waybill_code AND p.package_barcode = i.package_barcode AND i.inspection_type = 40 AND i.yn = 1)
AND LIMIT #{fetchNum, jdbcType=INTEGER}
select.insert:
insert into pop_print (
) values ( SEQ_POP_PRINT.NEXTVAL, #{waybillCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createSiteCode, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{printPackCode, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{printPackTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{printInvoiceCode, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{printInvoiceTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, NOW(), NOW(), 1, #{printPackUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{printInvoiceUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{popSupId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{popSupName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quantity, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{crossCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{waybillType, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{popReceiveType, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{printCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{thirdWaybillCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{queueNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{packageBarcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createUserCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{boxCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{driverCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{driverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{busiId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{busiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
select.update:
update pop_print
print_pack_code = #{printPackCode, jdbcType=INTEGER}, print_pack_user = #{printPackUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, print_pack_time = #{printPackTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
print_count = #{printCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
print_count = NVL(print_count, 0) + 1,
print_invoice_code = #{printInvoiceCode, jdbcType=INTEGER}, print_invoice_user = #{printInvoiceUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, print_invoice_time = #{printInvoiceTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_site_code = #{createSiteCode, jdbcType=INTEGER},
pop_sup_id = #{popSupId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pop_sup_name = #{popSupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cross_code = #{crossCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
waybill_type = #{waybillType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pop_receive_type = #{popReceiveType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
third_waybill_code = #{thirdWaybillCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
queue_no = #{queueNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = NOW(),
where waybill_code = #{waybillCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and yn = 1

update pop_print
print_pack_code = #{printPackCode, jdbcType=INTEGER}, print_pack_user = #{printPackUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, print_pack_time = #{printPackTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
print_invoice_code = #{printInvoiceCode, jdbcType=INTEGER}, print_invoice_user = #{printInvoiceUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, print_invoice_time = #{printInvoiceTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_site_code = #{createSiteCode, jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_user_code = #{createUserCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_user = #{createUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pop_sup_id = #{popSupId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pop_sup_name = #{popSupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cross_code = #{crossCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
waybill_type = #{waybillType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pop_receive_type = #{popReceiveType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
third_waybill_code = #{thirdWaybillCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
queue_no = #{queueNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BOX_CODE = #{boxCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DRIVER_CODE = #{driverCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DRIVER_NAME = #{driverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
busi_id = #{busiId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
busi_name = #{busiName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = NOW(),
where waybill_code = #{waybillCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and package_barcode = #{packageBarcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and operate_type = #{operateType,jdbcType=INTEGER} and yn = 1
